file_content.text: Assessment: You have been exceedingly sporting during our hunt.
I am HK-47, the master's most faithful ally. Once a mere assassin droid, it is now my burden and joy to command the Foundry's mechanical armies.
It's time to turn over the extermination units.
Give me control of the droids.
Rejection: I would not advise taking control, given their current programming.
I didn't think Jedi believed in assassination... or built droids to do their dirty work.
A Jedi with an assassin droid?
Commentary: I am often pleasantly surprised by my master's moral compass.
Arrogant machine.
Objection: My pride is entirely warranted.
The extermination droids are my master's crowning achievement. They are equipped with bioscanners capable of detecting Sith genetic material.
Any organics with Sith ancestry will be slaughtered! This includes ninety-seven-point-eight percent of the Imperial population.
The Foundry belongs to the Empire. Your droids won't get far.
I think we're finished here.
This was never about winning the war. You're talking about genocide.
Your master is insane!
Emphasis: Ninety-seven-point-eight percent efficient genocide.
Too bad my species doesn't have any "Sith genetic material."
Guess I should feel lucky.
So when you wipe out half the galaxy, I'll be one of the survivors.
Guess I should feel lucky.
Commentary: Unfortunately for you, the master still wants you dead.
I'm surprised your master had it in him. Maybe he'll be a challenge after all.
Ruthless. I'm impressed.
Commentary: As much as I'm looking forward to butchering our enemies planet-by-planet, I have missed the personal touch.
Your bones will make excellent trophies to commemorate my return to assassination.
Rejection: I have nothing to say to you.
Warning! Excessive damage sustained!
Commentary: I hope my master will appreciate my efforts here.
Retraction: You're not entirely unskilled after all. Activating assassination protocols, level two.
Extrapolation: Your death will occur within the next sixty seconds. Consider trying harder.
Slaughter programs loaded!
Extermination units, converge!
Prejudice set to maximum.
